dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex issues into manageable parts and analyze them step by step.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their approach, often making rapid decisions based on gut feelings.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Preference
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to handle data?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on visual representations of data, such as charts and graphs, to understand trends and patterns.
Your FarTwin will prefer to work with numerical data, using statistical analysis and mathematical models to extract insights.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will write clearly and directly, getting straight to the point without unnecessary embellishments.
Your FarTwin will focus on storytelling and using vivid descriptions to engage their audience.

dimensions.label: Artistic Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves through art?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on creating realistic depictions of subjects, often striving for precision and accuracy.
Your FarTwin will explore abstract concepts and ideas through art, using color and texture to evoke emotions and moods.
Your FarTwin will have high goals and aspirations, striving to achieve greatness in their chosen field.
Your FarTwin will be more laid-back and realistic about their goals, prioritizing stability over ambition.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach collaboration?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take an active role in leading and directing collaborations, ensuring their ideas are heard.
Your FarTwin will work closely with others to achieve a shared goal, listening actively and adapting to changing circumstances.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize punctuality and adhering to schedules, often becoming quite rigid in their time management.
Your FarTwin will be more adaptable with their time management, allowing for flexibility and spontaneity when needed.
